name: Football 2018 - World Soccer Game
description:
Football 2018 - World Soccer Game is a fun and entertaining challenging sport-physics game. Use your boom boom football striker skills and score penalty experience to loss your opponents, Build your dream team and lead them and you must aim to kick accurate shoots as possible in detailed challenging levels.

Football 2018 - World Soccer Game is the new free soccer app, the experts for games for all ages, boys, girls and the whole family. Be a goalie or a striker and catch the cup. As striker you determine the shooting-direction, the shooting-power and the shooting-hight. Catch the ball and defeat your opponent. Choose from multiple teams and score more goals than your rival in this fun free soccer game. Play yourself to the top and become champion!

Features:
- Multiple teams to choose from.
- Game modes.
- Different power-ups.
- Intuitive gameplay.
- Great graphics.
